comments.author: EnemyCrusher.7324
comments.body:
To answer my own question, it’s a font called Menomonia.

It’s apparently named after a genus of trilobite. Very nice.

https://d1h9a8s8eodvjz.cloudfront.net/fonts/menomonia/08-02-12/menomonia.css
https://d1h9a8s8eodvjz.cloudfront.net/fonts/menomonia/08-02-12/menomonia-italic.css

comments.body: Does anyone know what font is used for location names on the map?
